keyword: how many calories in mozzarella sticks
title: How Many Calories in Mozzarella Sticks?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in mozzarella sticks for a typical 3-stick serving, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and preparation tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in Mozzarella Sticks?
assumptions: Deep-fried frozen mozzarella sticks, standard commercial brand, ~28 g each with breading and cheese; no dipping sauce included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, frying method, and added ingredients. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: Three mozzarella sticks contain about 240 kcal and 15 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp marinara sauce per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one mozzarella stick?
faqs.a: About 80 kcal per standard fried mozzarella stick.

faqs.q: Are mozzarella sticks high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, three sticks have around 600 mg sodium due to breading and cheese.

faqs.q: What's the protein in mozzarella sticks?
faqs.a: Three sticks provide approximately 15 g protein from the cheese.

faqs.q: Do mozzarella sticks have trans fat?
faqs.a: A small amount, about 0.3 g in three sticks from frying oil.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in mozzarella sticks?
faqs.a: Opt for baking over frying or choose low-fat cheese to cut 30-50 kcal per serving.
